thought: To fulfill the user request, I need to define the necessary functions first: a manual trigger, reading from Google Sheets, calling AI completion, and sending emails via Gmail.

Define an aiCompletion action to classify descriptions.
Define a Gmail send message action to send classification results.
criticism: The current plan lacks function definitions, so the workflow cannot be implemented or tested yet.
